dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bcoll.pay.PaymentItem
dataStructure.description:
PaymentItem is the application of CustomerPayment. PaymentItem is applied to CustomerBillInvoice, AppliedCustomerBillingRate.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: PaymentItem
